serial.title: Charger Serial Number
serial.description: Enter the serial number of your charger. This is used to identify the correct sensor entities. You can find it in the go-e app or on the charger itself.

charger_entities.title: Configure Sensor Entities
charger_entities.description: Select the Home Assistant sensor entities for your charger. Known profiles have pre-filled suggestions — verify or adjust them for your installation.

data_description.car_status_entity: Sensor reporting the car connection state (e.g. sensor.goe_123456_car_value)
data_description.car_status_charging_value: Sensor value that means ''currently charging'' (e.g. 2 for go-e, ''charging'' for Easee)
data_description.energy_unit: Unit reported by the energy sensor
data_description.power_entity: Sensor reporting current charging power in Watts
data_description.rfid_entity: Sensor reporting the active RFID / transaction token
data_description.total_energy_entity: Sensor reporting total lifetime energy dispensed
data_description.rfid_uid_entity: Sensor reporting the last scanned RFID UID (requires rde=true for go-e)
data_description.charger_name: Friendly name for this charger (shown in device registry)
data_description.charger_host: IP address or hostname of the charger (required for go-e direct API access in PR-08)

confirm.title: Complete Setup
confirm.description: Your EV Charging Manager for ''{charger_name}'' is ready to install. Click Submit to complete the setup and register the charger device.

error.entity_not_found: Entity not found in Home Assistant. Check the entity ID and try again.
error.entity_unavailable: Entity exists but is unavailable or in an unknown state. Ensure the underlying integration is running.

abort.already_configured: This integration is already configured. Each charger requires a separate instance.

init.title: Session Engine Options
init.description: Adjust session filtering and persistence settings.

data_description.min_session_duration_s: Sessions shorter than this are discarded as micro-sessions (0–3600 s, default 60)
data_description.min_session_energy_wh: Sessions with less energy than this are discarded (0–10000 Wh, default 50)
data_description.persistence_interval_s: How often an active session is saved to disk in case of HA restart (60–3600 s, default 300)
data_description.max_stored_sessions: Oldest sessions are pruned when this limit is exceeded (100–10000, default 1000)

data_description.name: A friendly name for this vehicle (e.g. ''Peugeot 3008 PHEV'')
data_description.usable_battery_kwh: Usable portion of battery in kWh (defaults to total capacity if not set)

data_description.name: A friendly name for this vehicle
data_description.usable_battery_kwh: Usable portion of battery in kWh

data_description.name: Name of the person (e.g. ''Paul'')
data_description.type: Regular user or guest with custom pricing

data_description.guest_pricing_method: How to calculate the charging price for this guest
data_description.price_per_kwh: Fixed price per kWh (required for ''fixed'' method)
data_description.markup_factor: Multiply base price by this factor (required for ''markup'' method, must be > 1.0)

data_description.name: Name of the person
data_description.active: Whether this user is active. Deactivating cascades to RFID mappings.

data_description.guest_pricing_method: How to calculate the charging price for this guest
data_description.price_per_kwh: Fixed price per kWh (required for ''fixed'' method)
data_description.markup_factor: Multiply base price by this factor (required for ''markup'' method)

error.price_required: Price per kWh is required when using fixed pricing method.
error.markup_required: Markup factor is required when using markup pricing method.

data_description.card_index: RFID card slot index (0–9, corresponds to go-e app slots 1–10)
data_description.user_id: The user this RFID card is assigned to
data_description.vehicle_id: The vehicle associated with this card (optional, e.g. for guests without a car)

data_description.user_id: The user this RFID card is assigned to
data_description.vehicle_id: The vehicle associated with this card (optional)

error.already_mapped: This card slot is already assigned to another user.
error.no_available_slots: All 10 card slots (0–9) are already in use.
